title: Arizona - Grand Canyon: very robust plants and trees frame Powell Point (at 2,155 meters elevation)
description: Powell Point  @ south rim was chosen as the site for the dedication ceremony of Grand Canyon National Park, in 1920. The overlook is a good location for sunset watching
author: Reinhard Link
generated_description: Hardy desert vegetation frames the scenic overlook at Powell Point on the Grand Canyon's South Rim at 2,155 meters elevation. This historic viewpoint was chosen for the Grand Canyon National Park's dedication ceremony in 1920. The location offers excellent vantage points for sunset viewing, with native plants adapted to the harsh rim environment providing natural framing.
